A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a very anticlimactic movie that had too much comedy and missed opportunities for great storytelling.  Benecio DelToro's character was unneeded\, Fin's love story was rushed with no chemistry\,  the 2 big deaths made no sense\,  Ray and Darth whoever's bond broke in a way that was disappointing\, and there was an underlying theme of \"suicide is bad ass!\". Nobody has mentioned Yoda's weird muppet mouth. Why didn't anyone CGI that a bit? Just confused and disappointed. Rey still has had 0 minutes training making this Disney princess story even more confusing. Sad day for the force.
